name: fat_cat_TESSEL
description: device code for tessel 2 fat cat web based cat feeder

scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploying via USB...' && t2 push --usb index.js
scripts.start:usb: echo 'Running on Tessel device via USB...' && t2 run --usb index.js
scripts.start:wifi: echo 'Running on Tessel device via wifi...' && t2 run index.js
scripts.start:local: echo 'Starting web UI...' && PROFILE=local && node index.js
